mapper.sql: id, uid, sender_name, receiver_name, sender_status, receiver_status, title, content, send_time
mapper.insert: insert into tb_mailbox (uid, sender_name, receiver_name, sender_status, receiver_status, title, content, send_time) values (#{uid}, #{senderName}, #{receiverName}, #{senderStatus}, #{receiverStatus}, #{title}, #{content}, #{sendTime})
mapper.update: update tb_mailbox set sender_status = #{newStatus} where id=#{id}
update tb_mailbox set receiver_status = #{newStatus} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select from tb_mailbox where sender_name=#{senderName} and sender_status = #{senderStatus}
select from tb_mailbox where receiver_name=#{receiverName} and receiver_status != 2 and sender_status != 1
